channel.title: Client sizes?
channel.description:
[b]whats your client size?[/b] must include the class size and the java size
[b]class:[/b] 360 kb [b]java:[/b] 1.13 kb
the better conventions the lower the class size the java file doesnt determine the lag its the class file that does
some one could hava a client.java at 500 kb and their class at 490 kb depending on their conventions
[b]- note[/b] i used the convention tool that was made by i loot i i think? my client.java was at 830 kb and the class at 364 kb when i used it i got the results above

item.title: Client sizes?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

whats your client size?
must include the class size and the java size

class: 360 kb
java: 1.13 kb

the better conventions the lower the class size
the java file doesnt determine the lag
its the class file that does

some one could hava a client.java at 500 kb
and their class at 490 kb
depending on their conventions

- note
i used the convention tool that was made by i loot i i think?
my client.java was at 830 kb and the class at 364 kb
when i used it i got the results above

Read full topic
